Name: Pont 13
Review Text: I went there for a work dinner, we had a 3 course meal, very tasty. The dessert was not as great as the other dishes but still tasty. There was another group at an adjacent table and it was a bit noisy, but still very good. I will go again. It could be great in summer if outdoor seating is possible.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: I loved the environment than I did the food. Not much options to choose from but very serene area.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Good food, unique atmosphere of a decommissioned ferry. When we arrived, we were greeted by the welcome scent of smoked food in their large, wood-burning stove and an airy space with very high ceilings. All the food was good and I'd return for the experience, probably in warmer weather when we can sit outside and enjoy the water views.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: The atmosphere was awesome. Food and service great and location cool! Definitely worth checking out. They cater for all diets too.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Absolutely stunning establishment. The food was really tasty and the service was great too. Only complaints would be that it's a long walk out of the centre and that between serving the 'lunch' and 'dinner' menus all that was available for ‚Ä¶

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Amazing, cozy, great food. If you want to get away from the city and relax by the water, look no further. The decor inside is really out of a movie. So tasteful, original furniture, floor, fixtures, lighting. The surprise of it all is that it's cheap. Go crazy!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: The restournat is in an old ferry, the same ones that take people from Central Station to North. I had the pontburger which was very good, they also have vegetarian and vegan options available for certain dishes. The staff was very nice as well.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: One of the best places to have wonderful food while enjoying a truly amazing typically Amsterdam ambiance.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Nice location, friendly staff, decent food and pricing. Especially great during sunny days when you can sit outside and enjoy the Amsterdam harbour scenery.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text:
Beautiful place, rough in a nice way, good beers, great burger, fries top, all handmade/local. Friendly staff and good music.
Great place!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text:
This is where the locals go. Good food.
Its remote but very much worth it. You can go there by boat as well.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Lovely food. Everything so fresh. Very good customer service.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: It was very quiet as we were there on a Wednesday in September, but it was absolutely lovely. The food was excellent and the staff friendly. Eating on a boat with a nice view on the water is definitely a plus. The neighbourhood is still a work in progress, but still nice. I would definitely recommend it.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Amazing place, delicious food!!! I strongly recommend it!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Great to have lunch at an old Amsterdam Ferry and always good to be surrounded by water. It is great to see the history. The menu is not extensive but you have all what you need. Service was great and there is enough space to feel safe in this 1,5 mtr society.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: This is an epic flouting restaurant. It's an old bout docked in a quiet harbour. I just love the vibe in this restaurant. I really like this place, especially in the summer time. Ideal restaurant to go in couple or just to hangout with ‚Ä¶

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Lovely restaurant on an old decommissioned ferry. The food is very good for a reasonable cost.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Ok-ish food but really good service!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Amazing place to enjoy a dinner in Amsterdam! The food is amazing, the view is stunning and the service excellent! We were with a group of 50 people and they made sure we had fun and enjoyed ourselves! Highly recommend!!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Nice location right on the water. Great spot to have some beers or a bite to eat when the sun is shining. Food was fresh and tasty - really enjoyed the watermelon salad üëåüèº

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Nice place close to the water. On warm days kids are swimming around.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text:
Nice place for lunch or dinner. The area doesn‚Äôt have that many options yet and this is an interesting place. It can get a little noisy at times though.
Food is good and a little less expensive than the nearby REM island, which has the same owner I believe.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Been here a few times for lunch and service was usually on the slow side, but still acceptable. Today I went there with my wife at 1pm for a simple sandwich. We had to wait about 20 minutes before our order was even taken. We  both ordered ‚Ä¶

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Perfect place for lunch or dinner

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Great food, great service & what I can only describe as a must see for qwerky interesting pub designs.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Very nice restaurant: a boat on the sea... iron and wood together! Waiters are so kind, fillet was really good! Nice icecream too... fog outside during the winter...

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: One of my favorite places for summer in Amsterdam. Last year it was closed in the winter. It is located on a big boat, offering a great open air atmosphere. You may even sit down for a coffee during the day, or dinner later on. They also have a nice interior, if it gets chilly. Food was also very good and staff was friendly too.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Nice simple place...solid food...two young girls behind the bar...two different concepts...great expirience...üòäüëç

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Must visit.. friendly staff, awesome location, cool ambience and good food ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Friendly staff, menu limited but good quality, and reasonably priced. Desserts especially high quality and inventive (dark chocolate mousse served with balsamic vinegar on the side, and an aniseed like mico-herb topping!)

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: A restaurant on a boat! Amazing food and wines with great service.  Make sure to book a table in advance as it gets quite busy.  It's best to get a taxi there as it's a bit of a hike from the city centre.  Say hi to Storm, the dog - he walks around like he owns the place! :-)

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Incredibly good food but above all an amazing atmosphere. The interior ties in with the entire experience of eating at Pont 13. It's a bit out of the way but make sure you try the smoked T-bone steak.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Located on an old ferry that has been transformed into a restaurant and bar. The interior of the boat/restaurant is industrial and the view you have over the water is really beautiful. If you are looking for an unique hotspot along the IJ river in Amsterdam, this is a place to look up!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Good food . Friendly staff, beautifull place

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Super chill place, food is a little pricey but definitly worth it ! the meat was really great ! desert nice. Good mix of people !

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Lovely dockside bar with good food and good beer.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Beautiful location!  Very friendly staff, reasonable drink prices, delicious fries.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Amazing restaurant. Good food and very friendly staff, in a cool boat setting as well

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Really relaxing atmosphere.  Not the best food but the perfect hidden away place to make you feel like a local to have a drink.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Great Service, view and starters. Solid main dishes. Will come back in my next trip to Amsterdam.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Nice place to wine and dine. Although it's pricy it's also really good. Pro tip: order a starter as well, the meals aren't that big.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Just beautiful. Lovingly converted ferry, still smells of the real deal. Nice food & service too.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Unique place - inside of a historic ferry boat providing a great view. Frequently changing menu. Great food and service!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Overall good. Good experience to get away from the centre. Don‚Äôt expect amazing food as you are still in NL after all...

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Delicious fresh fish! Friendly and accommodating staff. Beautiful views over the harbour. Yummy...

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: What a nice restaurant that was! Good food, very friendly staff and the knowledge to sit in an old ferryboat is great! Go there!!!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: I ate the best gamba's ever here. Great view, the nicest staff and sweet sweet sweet deserts. The best evening!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Cozy, non-pretentious place at a unique location with well-served food. Good for lunch; parking available in front.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Nice relaxed place for dinner and drinks. You can moor your boat and have a drink.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Went here after left disappointed from REM Island. Great location, great staff, affordable food that was just right for nice bistro-faire. Will go again!

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: If you work in the area this place is a nice getaway for lunch. Yummy sandwiches but a small food and drink selection in general.

Name: Pont 13
Review Text: Delicious fish, superb location. I like the fact you first have to go through this industrial area and you think "Are we going the right way?"  until all of sudden you find this gem.
